short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays recent posts from TechMaish blog.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Readers of TechMaish.com can use this extension to display the most recent (10) posts in your favorite Chrome Browser. TechMaish.com covers topics related to blogging, seo, social media, internet, phones, gadgets and much more.

Simply install the plugin and load recent posts any time you want.
